job description:
Senior Data Engineer
In this role, you’ll partner closely with software engineers, and data scientists to power analytical data products, experimentation, and machine learning models. The best person will have a strong communication, and engineering background to tie initiatives to business impact.
What you will do?
  • Partner with engineering teams and internal data consumers on new projects or enhancements
  • Build highly scalable data pipelines and continuously experiment with different patterns
  • Evolve our data architecture to balance scale and performance
  • Build and improve internal tools, and contribute findings to the larger team
Here are some examples of our work
  • Data Modeling - Partner with data consumers to improve existing data models and build different facets of the business for analytics
  • Data Pipelines - Rewrite existing pipelines using Spark (Scala) to make them more efficient in terms of latency and compute
  • Data Quality and Anomaly Detection - Improve existing tools to measure data quality through metrics and automatically alert on change
  • Analytic Data Products - Engineer storage layers using Druid, Hive, Redshift to power interactive JavaScript applications
  • Experimentation - As business evolves, redesign the infrastructure to capture additional metrics for AB experimentation or new feature rollouts
  • Machine Learning - In addition to feature engineering, build feedback loops in a Pub/Sub model between ML models and production applications
Who are you?
  • Analytical mindset to bring together engineering solutions and business impact
  • Software engineering mindset and ability to write elegant, maintainable code, and follow engineering best practices
  • Experienced in scalable data architectures and schema design
  • Expertise in building data pipelines on large complex datasets
  • Expertise in one or more programming languages (Scala, or Python)
  • Knowledge and familiarity with other distributed data stores (Elasticsearch, Druid)
  • Strong SQL (Presto, Spark SQL, Hive) skills
  • Excellent communication to collaborate with partners and independently drive decisions
